General.Name: BR Advisory Partners
General.Description: BR Advisory Partners Participações S.A., through its subsidiaries, operates as an investment bank that specializes in providing financial advisory and investment services for entrepreneurs and families in Brazil. The company offers financial and strategic advisory services related to mergers and acquisitions, sales of shareholdings, fund raising, strategic partnerships and corporate restructuring, and financial restructuring; and advisory services to its clients for raising funds from investors through debt instruments, as well as operates in the structuring and distribution of financial products. The company also provides foreign exchange services; derivatives and surety services; treasury management, and asset and liability management services, as well as raisies funds from customers and third parties. In addition, the company renders advisory and consulting services, securities portfolio administration and third-party asset management, and corporate management consulting. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in São Paulo, Brazil. BR Advisory Partners Participações S.A. is a subsidiary of BR Partners Holdco Participações Ltda.
General.Address: Av. Brigadeiro Faria Lima, 3.355, São Paulo, SP, Brazil, 04538-133
